tasks.mxbinde: rm -rf ./matrix-rust-sdk/target && cd ./matrix-rust-sdk/bindings/matrix-sdk-crypto-deno/ && deno run -A ./cli.ts -- --workspace --exclude matrix-sdk-base --exclude matrix-sdk-common --exclude matrix-sdk-crypto --exclude matrix-sdk-qrcode --exclude matrix-sdk-sled --exclude matrix-sdk-store-encryption --exclude matrix-sdk-test --exclude matrix-sdk-test-macros && cd ../../../
tasks.mxbindec: rm -rf ./matrix-rust-sdk/target && cd ./matrix-rust-sdk/bindings/matrix-sdk-crypto-deno/ && cargo clean && deno run -A ./cli.ts -- --workspace --exclude matrix-sdk-base --exclude matrix-sdk-common --exclude matrix-sdk-crypto --exclude matrix-sdk-qrcode --exclude matrix-sdk-sled --exclude matrix-sdk-store-encryption --exclude matrix-sdk-test --exclude matrix-sdk-test-macros && cd ../../../
tasks.extraExc: NOT A COMMAND! matrix eclusions not found --exclude matrix-sdk --exclude matrix-sdk-appservice --exclude matrix-sdk-indexeddb
